title: Bug 17825 ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: The bug report describes an issue where unexpected 'ding' sounds occur in ControlExampleText when certain actions are taken.
OB: The observed behavior includes the unexpected 'ding' sound when selecting SWT.MULTI, and similar sounds when clicking on other buttons.
EB: The expected behavior is that selecting SWT.MULTI or performing other actions should not produce a 'ding' sound, as it typically indicates an error.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Use Build F1 (20020521) on Win2K. 
2. Open the SWT example ControlExample. 
3. Go to the Text tab. 
4. Observe that selecting Styles SWT.MULTI and clicking on buttons produces the unexpected 'ding' sounds.
